name: Reality (itch)
description:
A short game (about 5 minutes) made in Godot about trying to do things even when you don't want to and clinging to identities.

Sleeping replenishes willpower, it might not be immediately obvious. To play the game again exit the game and start over.

I would love any feedback on the game and post here if you find any bugs in it. It's my first game so please be forgiving of any bugs you guys find.
